project.name: fastutil
project.description: fastutil extends the Java Collections Framework by providing type-specific maps, sets, lists, and queues with a small memory footprint and fast operations; it provides also big (64-bit) arrays, sets, and lists, sorting algorithms, fast, practical I/O classes for binary and text files, and facilities for memory mapping large files. This jar (fastutil-core.jar) contains data structures based on integers, longs, doubles, and objects, only; fastutil.jar contains all classes. If you have both jars in your dependencies, this jar should be excluded.
